meanings.definition: A person affected by thalassemia, a genetic blood disorder.
meanings.sent1: Many thalassemics require regular blood transfusions.
meanings.sent2: Doctors are studying ways to help thalassemics live healthier lives.

meanings.sent5: The community came together to support thalassemics in need of treatment.

meanings.sent2: Researchers are exploring new treatments for thalassemics worldwide.
